channel.title: vektr.news
channel.description: AI-curated cryptocurrency news and analysis from trusted sources across the web. Stay updated with Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, and the latest crypto market trends.

item.title: CoinShares reports 26% AUM increase to $3.46B in Q2
item.description: CoinShares reports $32.4M profit in Q2 and eyes US listing. Executives anticipate growth in second half with Bitcoin and Ether reaching record highs.

item.title: A New Vision For Money: Hoskinson Predicts Bitcoin Will Hit $10 Trillion
